name: Ghost Circuit Hunter (Not me)
description:
Be in the shoes of a Ghost Circuit Hunter! Your task is to hunt down every single one of those pesky little circuit bugs that are scattered across the plane. Your help is urgently needed, as this zone is one of the most crucial zone of our spaceship and...

Wait, my boss called me. One second.

Yeah, he needs me to find his missing part again. Mr. Teddy is not patient to me, though. Maybe you can help me find it in time.
And no, Ghost Circuit Hunter is Not me
